      • convertToTimeUnit

        public static Time convertToTimeUnit(Time time,
                                     TimeUnit unit)
        Converts a Time object to the given TimeUnit. Note: when convert from small unit to bigger unit, the function will round the number e.g 5200Ps = 5Ns
